docs.title: Iphone Unlock Request Pending and Pending and Pending and Pending and Pending...
docs.text: 'm in the process of switching carriers as i have started a new business and am now able to set up an account through my business. i have been a loyal and happy wwireless customer for over 13 years and currently have 4 iphones on a family plan. upon starting the process of switching carries i initiated unlock requests for all four of my devices, having approximately 2 weeks remaining in my billing cycle i feel confident things will get switched over with plenty of time to spare. the unlock portal on wwireless.com worked well enough for 3 of the lines as the approval email came through in less than 12 hours. my fourth line, however, is currently 'in progress' as it has been for 6 days now.after numerous lengthy calls with customer support, no one is able to properly address my problem and provide a solution, all i hear is that only the 'back office' handles device unlock. i'm also told that csr's have no way to contact the 'back office'. i find this absurd. all i get are apologies and csr's telling me to just wait a day, and then another day.so here i am, three days to go until my billing cycle ends and i have a sense that things will not be resolved until after wwireless has wrung another $293.65 out of me. please help.

docs.title: LG G5 $300 visa gift card promotion
docs.text: purchased my lg g5 12/15/16 when there was a promotion for the $300 visa gift card. i still haven't received my gift card. wwireless customer service can't find the promotion. where is my gift card wwireless??? i've spoken with 9 people and can't seem to get this problem resolved. i'm being passed from person to person, patrionized, and made to feel like i am scamming wwireless for a gift card. i didn't pull this promotion out of my rear and make it up. i don't appreciate the way i've been treated and how this issue cannot seem to be resolved.

docs.title: ATT ATT Not Unlocking iPhone 7 Even Though Phone and Account Paid In Full
docs.text: have been with wwireless for years. recently, i decided to close my account, pay off my two iphone 7s, and ask to have to have the phones unlocked that i purchased on a bogo through wwireless. i called wwireless and paid off the two iphones completely. i asked that the phones be unlocked.i also submitted requests online. the following day i received an email from wwireless that one phone was unlocked. the second phone i received no information. but when i checked online the day after as to the status (giving it 48 hours from when the request was first made), the message was that the unlocking was denied as the account information did not match.i immediately called customer service. they could not explain the problem. they thought it might be a "placeholder" error message. they indicated that there was an open ticket on the unlocking of the cell phone and that there was a completion date of march 7. their only advice was "wait" and that someone will contact me.it is the end of business day on march 8 and the phone is not unlocked, nor has anyone contacted me. customer service has been of no use. they say that no one can talk to the unlocking department (not even them). wwireless gladly took my money for the phones and service. yet, their inability or unwillingness to unlock a phone that i bought through wwireless and that has been fully paid (with an account that is paid in full as well) has been frustrating.what should i do?

docs.title: AT&T won't unlock my iPhone
docs.text: was an original iphone customer with the unlimited grandfathered data. when wwireless announced another price increase on the data plan in january, i decided to switch to another carrier. i received an email from wwireless stating that if i canceled my contract due to the price increase, the etf would be waived. i also verified this several times via chat with customer support prior to porting my number.fastforward to several weeks later, i ported my number and wwireless is refusing to unlock my phone. the account is paid in full, and i haven't been charged an etf (as far as i know), but they will not unlock the phone. i have chwwirelessed with at least a dozen customer service reps and opened two separate cases to get my phone unlocked, and yet i am still unable to do so. i even received an email stating my device was unlocked, but it was not true.everyone agrees that my etf is supposed to be waived and that there are no outstanding charges on my account, and that my device is eligible to be unlocked, but wwireless will notactually unlock it.i am at my wits end - customer service chat is outright lying about unlockingmy device, and when i call the custimer service line, i get rerouted to non-functioning numbers and/or fax lines, or just hung up on. it's not just incompentence, there is outright deception. however, it seems i have no options to resolve this other than buying a new phone and ditching the device i rightfully own.be forewarned - if you cancel your service due to a price increase in your data plan (as is your right), wwireless seems to hold your device hostage even though they are supposed to unlock it.

docs.title: ATT customer service backs store fraud
docs.text: m story;i had my iphone stolen while i was on vacation. i went to the nearest wwireless retail store(300 miles from my home wwireless store). i had them shut my iphone down and erase all data stored on phone. this service was great, didn't know they could do this. they even located the phone so i could give local police deptment the location. now for the fraud.since i needed a new phone, the salesman said we have a great promotion, bogo, buy one get one free. i said i didn't need two phones since my wife had one allready. the salesman the states, "with this plan she will get a new phone no charge". at that point he explaines the 3 month wait, and how i will get credited back, and then her phone will be free. so, i agree and i walk out with two new phones.$months later, my bill hasn't changed, no refund, and still paying for extra phone. i go to my local wwireless store, they say they can't do anything and to contact store i purchased contract.i call the wwireless store i purchased phones from, they say its not there issue, and contact wwireless customer support.i call wwireless customer support, they said they will review the case and call me back within week. i give them three weeks, no call back. i call wwireless again, they say they have no case review on file, and ask if i have a case number. i explain i didnt get a case number. they then give me a case number and will get back to me soon. another three weeks go by, still no call. i call back, give case number, wwireless customer support then tells me to contact wwireless retail store i purchased from its there issue. i told wwireless support we have gone this route already, but they insist i conteacr reail store. i try to call the wwireless retail store, the phone number is no longer inservice. with some searching i find wwireless had shut store down.so cal back wwireless customer service, get someone on line that actually listened to my problem. she opened case file and started working up here chain of command. she explaines the customer manager will give me a call back, i think great here we go again. but i get a call a hour later, the customer manager then tells me, i didn't qualify for the plan because i wasn't adding a new line, and there is nothing she could do. she then hung up the phone before i could ask anything. i instanatly redial, and get the same customer support lady i had earlier, she said she was sorry they couldn't do anything and was going to try another route. couple hours later she calls back and said she added another 5g to my 15g data plan free, but still can't do anything to change my contract.i call this customer fraud, wwireless retail store selling me a contract, and billing me for something i didn't sign up for. and wwireless corp. standing behind a store they shut down.gordon [edited for privacy-please do not post personal or unique information such as but not limited to full names, employee id numbers, email addresses, phone numbers, account numbers, etc.]

docs.title: for 4 months customer service has not solved my problem AND I have been a loyal wireless customer fo
docs.text: bought a new iphone 7 and traded in my iphone 6 they said wait a few months for credit to appear- now they say they have trade in but won't credit my account- no one returns my calls- 4 urgent cases owned by customer service- no reply to me after having 6 wireless lines for over 25 years- i hope they tape customer service calls because their service makes comcast look. good and that's nothing for wwireless to be proud of

docs.text: wht bands and frequencies will lte-m (also known as m1) operate on within the wwireless network? current lte cat 1 deployments operate on bands 2, 4, and 12 - will lte-m also run on those bands? is there a 'primary' band expected to be used on the network?i would like to understand what bands need to be supported on a product we are developing that will run on wwireless's network.
